content: Taking either side path to each this plaza leads to a large road with a few patrolling Monk Supporters and an Overseeing Monk, with two Thunder Rhino Masters guarding the main stairs upward.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Taking either side path to each this plaza leads to a large road with a few patrolling Monk Supporters and an Overseeing Monk, with two Thunder Rhino Masters guarding the main stairs upward.
